mapper.sql: id, zone_id AS zoneId, tenant_id AS tenantId, forder_type AS forderType, forder_name AS forderName, forder_cascade_id AS forderCascadeId, parent_id AS parentId, remark, create_time AS createTime, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime, is_delete AS isDelete
